```{r setup}
library(seqc)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
cuff <- read_cuffdiff(params$cuffdiff_path)
```

# Quality Control & Assment

Show content of the cuffdiff object.

```{r load_data}
cuff %>% print()
```

## Dispersion Plot

```{r dispersion_plot}
cuff %>% dispersionPlot()
```
